title: Artistic Style
summary: One of my styles for one of my projects.
content:
Many artists become obsessed with finding their art style, personally, I don't think it's a good idea. While I believe consistency is important, I also think that limiting oneself in that way can be detrimentalâ€”it has been. Have you heard of the same face syndrome?

I experiment with many styles; when I create illustrations for my projects, I prefer those from the anime/manga realm. However...

A couple of days ago, I started creating the illustrations I'll need for niupleis.com, the first illustration I completed is of one of my original characters, and I really liked the result from the lineart to the final rendering. Here it is:
